excerpt: San Pedro de Atacama is a town set on an arid high plateau in the Andes mountains of northeastern Chile. Its dramatic surrouding landscape incorporates desert, salt flats, volcanoes, geysers and hot springs. The Valle de la Luna in the nearby Los Flamencos National Reserve is a lunarlike depression with unusual rock formations, a huge sand dune and pink-streaked mountains.
detail_description: San Pedro de Atacama is a charming town located in the Andes mountains of northeastern Chile, surrounded by a diverse and dramatic landscape that includes deserts, salt flats, volcanoes, geysers, and hot springs. The nearby Los Flamencos National Reserve features the Valle de la Luna with its unique rock formations and stunning natural scenery. The town offers a range of accommodations catering to different types of travelers.
name: San Pedro de Atacama
address: Antofagasta, Chile

detail_description: Piedras Rojas Hostal is located in the Altiplanic lagoons area, offering a full-day tour that covers various sites including Miscanti Lake, Laguna Miniques, Los Flamencos National Reserve, Salar de Aguas Calientes, and Piedras Rojas.
name: Piedras Rojas Hostal
address: San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

detail_description: Machuca is a beautiful and clean tourist destination with stunning ancestral buildings. Visitors can explore the local flora and fauna while enjoying the sale of llama meat anticuchos, making it a highly recommended experience. Many find it liberating to visit this precious place, as everything about it is simply wonderful.
name: Machuca
address: B-245, San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

excerpt: Warm quarters in a laid-back hostel featuring bold murals, plus a kitchen & cultural events.
detail_description: Casa Voyage Hostel in San Pedro de Atacama, Chile offers a cozy and laid-back atmosphere with vibrant murals, a communal kitchen, and cultural events. Guests can expect late nights by the bonfire, mingling with fellow backpackers, and enjoying traditional meals. The hostel provides spacious lounges, hammocks for relaxation, and organizes tours and dinners to facilitate connections among travelers. It's recommended for solo travelers as well as those seeking private rooms or domes.
name: Casa Voyage Hostel | Backpackers San Pedro de Atacama, Chile
address: Casa Voyage Hostel, Lascar 368, San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

detail_description: Altiplano Expediciones offers an authentic adventure in Chile, taking travelers to the high plateau of Altiplano, which sits at an impressive 13,125 feet above the desert floor. This iconic region is part of the Atacama Desert and is known for its llamas, salt flats, and blue lagoons. Unlike other travel agencies that focus on crowded tourist spots near San Pedro Atacama, Altiplano Expediciones provides a unique experience away from the crowds.
name: Altiplano Expediciones
address: Pasaje Solcor 732, Población Licancabur San Pedro de Atacama, 1410000 Antofagasta, Chile

detail_description: Embark on the Astronomic Tour in San Pedro de Atacama to witness the mesmerizing spectacle of the El Tatio geyser field at sunrise, with over 80 geysers spouting steam. Indulge in a traditional breakfast and relax in natural hot springs. Experience stargazing tours with telescopes and photography sessions, departing at 8pm and returning around 11pm from the town.
name: Astronomic Tour
address: Calama 440, 1410000 San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

detail_description: Lola is a popular restaurant and cafe located in San Pedro de Atacama, Chile. It is known for its inviting atmosphere and delicious gastronomy, offering specialties such as fresh pasta, tacos, pizzas, and empanadas. In addition to its dining options, Lola also features a bar area with a great selection of cocktails and a happy hour until 10:30 pm. The establishment transforms into a lively spot for late-night entertainment with karaoke sessions and a reggaeton dance area.
name: Lola's
address: Toconao 441, 1410000 San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

detail_description: Emporio Andino is a popular cafe and pastry shop located just west of the main Caracoles street in the Atacama desert. It's renowned for its large and plump empanadas, which come with a variety of fillings such as chicken, meat, vegetables, or potatoes. The restaurant offers fast and friendly service at a great price, around 3,000 pesos per empanada. They also provide vegan options including vegan cheese.
name: Emporio Andino
address: Caracoles 151, 1410000 San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

detail_description: Experience the wonders of the night sky with Atacama Stargazing, where you can join a tour led by knowledgeable guides who will share the history of astronomy and provide detailed explanations of constellations and stars. Enjoy local snacks under the stars while learning about the indigenous peoples' connection to the cosmos. Then, use high-powered telescopes to observe celestial bodies and take home fantastic photos capturing your stargazing adventure.
name: Atacama Stargazing

detail_description: Plaza de San Pedro de Atacama is a charming square where local vendors offer authentic crafts, making it a great place to immerse yourself in the local culture. The area boasts an amazing church made of clay and lush trees that thrive in the desert environment, creating a magical atmosphere. Visitors can enjoy the picturesque architecture and capture excellent photos while experiencing the warm and friendly ambiance of this beautiful town.
name: Plaza de San Pedro de Atacama
address: Caracoles 330, San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

detail_description: The Museo R. P. Gustavo Le Paige, zona de recinto transitorio is a fascinating museum located in Chile, known for its well-preserved fossils and artifacts due to the low rainfall in the area. It houses Shamanic items used for preparing and smoking hallucinogenic plants and offers high-quality pieces of Atacama's rich history spanning over 10,000 years. The museum provides clear explanations primarily in Spanish but also offers English speakers a booklet to follow along with the displays.
name: Museo R. P. Gustavo Le Paige
address: y, Tebenquinche entre Ave. Del Inca, Av. Pedro de Valdivia, 1410000 San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

detail_description: Mirador San Pedro is located about a 30-minute walk from the center of Atacama. Visitors can enjoy a stunning view, especially during sunset, although the area lacks facilities or infrastructure.
name: Mirador San Pedro
address: 3QWR+QJ, San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

detail_description: If you find yourself in San Pedro, make sure to stop by Franchuteria, a delightful French bakery that has quickly become a favorite among locals and travelers alike. This charming spot offers an array of freshly baked goods, including mouthwatering croissants and hearty sandwiches. The raspberry and white chocolate croissant is a standout treat that many claim is the best they've ever tasted! The ambiance is enhanced by lovely music, creating the perfect backdrop for enjoying their excellent coffee or rich hot chocolate.
name: Franchuteria
address: Caracoles 218, 1410000 San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

excerpt: Lunarlike desert landscape featuring pink-streaked mountains, scenic sunsets & unique rock forms.
detail_description: Valley of the Moon, located near Antofagasta, offers a lunar-like desert landscape with pink-streaked mountains and unique rock formations. Visitors can explore this famous valley and witness breathtaking sunsets. The city of Antofagasta serves as a gateway to these natural wonders and has a rich history tied to the 19th-century nitrate boom.
name: Valley of the Moon
address: San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

name: Lagunas Miscanti
address: San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

excerpt: Wooden walkways link 8 high-altitude pools with mineral-rich hot waters, surrounded by vegetation.
name: Puritama
address: Ruta, Guatin, San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

excerpt: Historic church inside a walled compound, with adobe construction & a wooden ceiling.
detail_description: Iglesia San Pedro is a historic church located within a walled compound, featuring adobe construction and a wooden ceiling. Dating back to 1640, it is the second oldest church in Chile. The bright white facade contrasts beautifully with the blue sky, but its interior is what truly sets it apart. Built without nails using cactus wood and llama leather, this church showcases Andean Baroque style.
name: Iglesia San Pedro
address: Caracoles 362, San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

excerpt: Rocky mountain plateau with an overhanging rock, a popular photo spot at sunset.
name: Mirador de Kari - Piedra del Coyote
address: San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

name: Laguna Cejar
address: San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

name: Piedras Rojas
address: San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

excerpt: Hillside archaeological site with ruins of a 12th-century stone fortress & sweeping valley views.
name: Pukará de Quitor
address: San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

excerpt: Scientific museum housed in geodesic domes & featuring an expansive collection of meteorites.
detail_description: The Meteorite Museum is a scientific museum located in geodesic domes, showcasing an extensive collection of meteorites. The museum offers a personal and private collection of mainly Atacama meteorites gathered over 35 years. Visitors can expect an in-depth explanation of each source of meteoric material with multiple examples that they can handle. The museum provides a twenty-minute tour that is a must-see for anyone interested in learning about what falls to earth through the atmosphere.
name: Meteorite Museum
address: Tocopilla 201, San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

detail_description: Lagunas Altiplánicas offers a stunning drive to Aguas Calientes, with beautiful lakes and volcanoes along the way. Some visitors find the ticketing process inconvenient, but picking up physical tickets in Socaire is manageable as it's en route. The landscape is compared to Iceland and described as breathtaking, resembling another planet with its surreal peace.
name: Lagunas Altiplánicas
address: San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

name: Petroglifos Yerbas Buenas
address: San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

excerpt: One of Chile's oldest archeological sites with a preserved town, water boreholes & human remains.
name: Tulor
address: San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

excerpt: Desert swimming holes known for their turquoise water with high salt content, popular for floating.
detail_description: Lagunas Escondidas de Baltinache is a collection of desert swimming holes renowned for their stunning turquoise water and high salt content, making it a popular spot for floating. The food at the site is highly recommended, but be prepared for long waits due to limited seating. Accessing the location involves driving around 40km on rough gravel roads, so it's advisable to use an SUV or larger vehicle.
name: Lagunas Escondidas de Baltinache
address: Desvío ruta, B-241, San Pedro de Atacama, Chile

name: Vado Río Putana
address: Río Putana, San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

excerpt: Dormant volcano with steep hiking to a 5,604m-high summit for views across the Atacama Desert.
name: Cerro Toco
address: San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

name: Cordillera de la Sal
address: San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile

name: Observatorio Alarkapin
address: ayllu de, Coyo, San Pedro de Atacama, Antofagasta, Chile
